lines.text: I wouldn't spare a drop of piss on her if she was burnin' to death.
Yeah, we're aware of your urinary problems, sir.
The only exercise you are gettin' is jumpin' to conclusions.
No offense ma'am, but it's always appeared to me your Dad's a few beers shy of a six-pack.
I'm simply curious, you just keep propositioning people until somebody says yes?

[addressing her father]
Would you please stop talking to me as if I were Jeff's age?
